item.title: A robust Qt Cookiecutter Template: desktop and mobile, continuous integration, auto linters & formatters
item.description: My wife’s company decided to share their incredible Qt project template, Open Source (BSD)! If you’re interested in building a user-facing application in C++, take a look.

item.title: Johns Hopkins University Data Science Specialization Work
item.description: In 2016 I completed, then mentored for, the Johns Hopkins University Data Science Specialization on Coursera. My project work was pretty interesting, and resulted in some fun Rpubs.

item.title: Exploring the Bay Area Through Data
item.description: Link to the Report. This is an R project I did a few years ago that explores Bay Area data in search of where my wife and I should live when we moved up here.
